title: HE the President graces ‘Ranaviru Abiman’ ceremony
content: His Excellency the president Mahinda Rajapaksa graced the ‘Ranaviru Abiman’ ceremony, the national conference of the Ranaviru Sansada officers as the chief guest at Temple Trees today (09th January). Secretary Defence and Urban Development Mr. Gotabaya Rayapaksa and chairperson of the MOD Seva Vanitha Unit Mrs. Ioma Rajapaksa were also present at the occasion….
